column2: “91. Every application made to the court in the course of an action,
incidental thereto, and not a step in the regular procedure, shall be

whose instance the settlement was arrive: made  by  motion  by  the  applicant
column2: in  person  or  his  counsel  or
registered attorney, and a memorandum in writing of such motion shall

whose instance the settlement was arrive: be at the same time delivered to the court”.
